column1: # The rainfall sheet for this gauge for 1951-1960 is missing from the Met Office archive volumes.
# Annual totals for 1951-1960 have been taken from British Rainfall almanacs for these years.
# The designation of the gauge changes from 'Sibsey (Ivydene)' to 'Sibsey (Main Road)' in British Rainfall 1954.
# The grid reference presented above is the one given in British Rainfall 1957; this is consistent with the church directions on the rainfall sheets - Ivydene is not marked on the map.
# The grid reference given in British Rainfall 1958 changes to TF352522, so the gauge seems to have moved about 700m north at this point.
# The station continued until 1963 according to MIDAS. (MIDAS src_id = 3961)
